body.description: It’s a problem as old as time: a baby's most sensitive places are also the messiest. So we say it’s about time for a solution. These non-allergenic wipes gently clean faces, hands and bottom places.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Get these on a subscription!
reviews.reviewText: These are excellent wipes for the price. The pouches they come in are nice and the ingredients are healthy. They have the right texture for cleaning thoroughly unlike some other wipes that I have tried. These are the best value wipes I have been able to find without all of the unnecessary ingredients. I have had these on an every four month subscription for my baby for over a year and it’s just the right amount.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good product, consistent quality
reviews.reviewText: I buy these wipes since my son was born, he’s 2 years old now and still love them. They are thick, they don’t break like other wipes. The smell is not too strong, which is nice. My son never had any allergy or reaction to the wipes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great wipe, sturdy and soft. Good for sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: I have put these wipes on a subscribe and save because we love them so much. My baby has sensitive skin and they are perfect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Small sheer flossy wipe
reviews.reviewText: The wipes aren't consistent. Each wipe in the package is unique. Occasionally, you get a wash cloth sized wipe that's heavy duty, which is a bonus. Otherwise, very soapy and wispy. They're unscented.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 8, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Our Go-To Choice for 5 Years & Counting
reviews.reviewText: Wow—I just popped in to amazon to order more of these and was curious why only 3.5 stars. I guess a lot of people have been getting a product that wasn’t stored properly or something. We have had these on our subscribe & save for 5.5 years—since my first child was born. I’m very wary of chemicals in products—especially those I use on my children. I tried other wipes over the years but always came back to these. To us, they are the perfect thickness, and we use them for just about everything—cleaning hands & face, in a pinch: high chair tray, tabletops, countertops, and of course, diapering. We keep one at the changing table, one in the bathroom (they’re not flushable but my 5YO still asks for them!), one in our diaper bag, one in any bag we take anywhere with the kids, one in each car... I often joke I will be subscribing to this item for the rest of my life—we have so many uses for these! I’m sensitive to smell and have never noticed anything offensive about the way these smell... A few years ago, these were in low supply for some reason and we had to switch temporarily...we were so bummed by competitor offerings (even my kids noticed), I called Babyganics to ask what was up—just a manufacturing delay. (Whew!) In a perfect world, I would have made my own water wipes, but as a busy working mama of 2, that was never in the cards. If I had to find a complaint about these: the price fluctuates substantially on Amazon. Other than that—to our family—these are practically perfect in every way. 😉

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 20, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wipes stay wet
reviews.reviewText: These start out a little scary because they sort of look like wet dryer sheets. You can imagine wiping a baby's mess with a dryer sheet might be a bit frightening. But lo and behold they've never ripped and my hands have stayed free of baby poo. We use these on both my 2 year old and 3 month old and they work wonderfully. They stay wet enough to wipe even the driest mess (you know what I'm talking about). The best part is we don't have a wipe dispenser and have accidentally opened about 6 packages. We have one in the car, in the diaper bag and on the changing table. The packages seal up perfectly! You never reach for a wipe and have to pull out the first three to find a wet one because the adhesive top sticks well enough to retain all the moisture. We bought these because the ingredients appear to be the best for baby's skin, and so far we've had no redness or rashes. I am happy subscribed to receive these monthly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Does the job, but…
reviews.reviewText: 3 stars for doing the job as advertised. The smell is a bit off putting… I also have an issue with the size of the wipes, they are on the smaller size compared to other wipes say Honest or Kirkland brand. The moisture retention is good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Our favorite wipes
reviews.reviewText: Our baby has a sensitive bottom and these work great. They are gentle and non-scented and do not have any pattern on them that would cause them to be too coarse. The only downside is that they dont have the plastic flip top so you have to rely on the tape closure to keep the wipes moist and fresh.
the title says flushable wipes but the pack says do not flush. so i think abit of wrong description here
